justification: Misreads Team B: labels Anderson “high-volatility” despite high usage; ignores B’s injury aversion while assuming they’ll trade an injured TE; offers a committee RB and Tier 4 WR that don’t match B’s workhorse/possession-volume preferences. Overlooks B’s healthy Tier 2 TE (Roberts), so TE isn’t a need. Also conflicts with Team A’s injury-cautious profile by acquiring a doubtful TE. Acceptance probability is overstated.
